sentence.Network_en: Your camcorder should have these basic features: autofocus, playback facility, zoom lens.
sentence.Network_cn: 你的便携式摄像机应该具备以下基本功能：自动聚焦、回放功能、变焦镜头。

sentence.Network_en: I heard a playback of one of the tapes.
sentence.Network_cn: 我听到了其中一盘录音带的回放。

sentence.Network_en: A TV playback showed exactly what had happened.
sentence.Network_cn: 电视播放的录像原样显示了所发生的事.

entry.tran: （已录好的录音带、录像带的）回放，重放
entry.def: The playback of a tape is the operation of playing it on a machine in order to listen to the sound or watch the pictures recorded on it.

example.ex: I heard a playback of one of the tapes.
example.tran: 我听到了其中一盘录音带的回放。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of reproducing recorded sound;

sentences.sentence: "he was allowed to hear the playback of his testimony"

means.word_mean: 2. electronic equipment comprising the part of a tape recorder that reproduces the recorded material
